department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Grass cutting services at 5 CDSB Gagetown site locations.
description: Provide grass cutting services to the Department of National Defence - Real Property Operations Unit - Gagetown. The service includes furnishing of all labour, material, tools, and equipment required to complete the grass mowing and groundskeeping maintenance services at various locations of 5 CDSB Gagetown.
